author: jukka
msg: TIKA-281: Use repository.apache.org to deploy snapshots and releases
Drop POM settings that we now inherit from the parent POM.

author: esteve
msg: THRIFT-586. python: TSocket incorrectly sets the exception type when an end of file error occurs
TTransportException's type was set to "Transport not open" in some cases, which should
Use named arguments and set the type for TTransportException to END_OF_FILE in TSocket#read

author: jukka
msg: TIKA-281: Use repository.apache.org to deploy snapshots and releases
Upgrade to the org.apache:apache:6 parent POM.

author: elecharny
msg: Fixed the Comparator synchronizer : the newRDN was not injected into the modified entry
